FAIL_TO_PASS: when an argument has default value and no description then still return default value
when argument has default value description then return description and custom default description
when argument has no description then empty string
when argument has choices then choices included in helpInformation
when argument has choices and default then both included in helpInformation
when argument has description then return description
when argument has default value then return description and default value
when arguments described in deprecated way and empty description then arguments still included in helpInformation
when argument described then included in helpInformation
when arguments described in deprecated way then included in helpInformation
when argument described with default then included in helpInformation
